workerManagerResourceSpotAllocation

Class ResourceManager<T extends GatheringSource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • workerManagerResourceSpotAllocation.ResourceManager<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IResourceManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MineralPatchManager, RefineryManager

    abstract class ResourceManager<T extends GatheringSource>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IResourceManager
    ResourceManager.java --- Manager class for a List of GatheringSources. These include mainly the MineralPatchs and RefineryWrappers.
    Author:
    P H - 03.09.2017

      SortInterface.java --- Interface defining a sorter for gathering sources.

      • isSpaceAvailable

        public boolean isSpaceAvailable()
        Description copied from interface: IResourceManager
        Function defining if space is available in the resource manager or if no more Units can be added towards it.
        Specified by:
        isSpaceAvailable in interface IResourceManager
        Returns:
        true if Units can be added towards the resource manager or false if not space is available.

        Description copied from interface: IResourceManager
        Function for retrieving the number of assignable space that the manager currently has.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the number of Units that can be added towards the resource manager.

      • addToManager

        public boolean addToManager(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Description copied from interface: IResourceManager
        Function for adding a ResourceManagerEntry to a resource manager. The Unit is then assigned a gathering spot internally.
        Specified by:
        addToManager in interface IResourceManager
        Parameters:
        entry - the Unit that is going to be added towards a resource manager.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit was assigned towards a resource manager, false if not.

      • assignWorker

        private boolean assignWorker(ResourceManagerEntry worker)
        Function for assigning a new worker to a stored GatheringSource.
        Parameters:
        worker - the worker that is going to be added to a GatheringSource.
        Returns:
        true if the worker was successfully added to a GatheringSource, false if not.

      • sortGatheringSources

        private void sortGatheringSources(ResourceManagerEntry worker,
                                  ResourceManager.SortInterface<GatheringSource> sorter)
        Function for sorting the gathering sources of this instance.
        Parameters:
        worker - the worker that is going to be added to a GatheringSource.
        sorter - the sorter (Implementing the ResourceManager.SortInterface) that is going to be used while sorting.

      • removeFromManager

        public boolean removeFromManager(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Description copied from interface: IResourceManager
        Function for removing a ResourceManagerEntry from a resource manager.
        Specified by:
        removeFromManager in interface IResourceManager
        Parameters:
        entry - the Unit that is going to be removed from a resource manager.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit was successfully removed, false if it was not removed or not found.

      • removeWorker

        private boolean removeWorker(ResourceManagerEntry worker)
        Function for removing a worker from the GatheringSource that he was previously assigned to.
        Parameters:
        worker - the worker that is going to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if the worker was successfully removed, false if not.

      • getGatheringSource

        public bwapi.Unit getGatheringSource(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Description copied from interface: IResourceManager
        Function for retrieving the internally assigned gathering source of the specified ResourceManagerEntry.
        Specified by:
        getGatheringSource in interface IResourceManager
        Parameters:
        entry - the Unit that was previously added towards a resource manager and therefore must be assigned towards a gathering spot.
        Returns:
        the gathering spot (Unit) that the ResourceManagerEntry was assigned to internally ny the resource manager.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Function for testing if the ResourceManager contains a specific ResourceManagerEntry / worker.
        Parameters:
        entry - the worker which all gathering sources assigned to this ResourceManager are tested for.
        Returns:
        true if the ResourceManager has a gathering source assigned that contains the provided ResourceManagerEntry, otherwise false.
